title: How to write emails in a pandemic - Quora

response.answer_text: Any email irrespective of the situation, should convey precisely what you intend the reader to know, following the usual email writing rules. However during pandemic you can sound concerned about their safety soon after the salutation. While the whole world is marketing over the pandemic, it wouldn’t hurt to add a line in your email and show that you do care. It would even make it personalised even for a business communication. A simple “hope you as your family/team are safe and sound” soon after your greetings should help.
Open your PC then open your email app, then use your fingers on the key board to type it. Then press send.
